import React, { useState } from 'react'; import html2pdf from 'html2pdf.js'; export default function Verification() { const PrintComponent = () => { const [originalContent, setOriginalContent] = useState(''); var printData = () => { // Get the original content const body = document.getElementById('VerificationBody').innerHTML; const PrintResult = document.getElementById('PrintResult').innerHTML; // Set the content to be printed document.getElementById('VerificationBody').innerHTML = PrintResult; // Print the content window.print(); // Restore the original content document.getElementById('VerificationBody').innerHTML = body; // Save as PDF using html2pdf library html2pdf() .from(PrintResult) .save(); } }; return ( <>
